name: CATS AERO COLLEGE
about: CATS Aero College, formerly known as Cebu Aeronautical Technical School, is an institution of higher learning located in Lahug, Cebu City. We offer both 2 and 4-year programs tailored to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a career in aviation. Our curriculum includes a mix of theoretical studies and practical training, ensuring students are well-prepared for the industry. With a focus on quality education and hands-on experience, CATS Aero College is committed to producing competent and skilled aviation professionals. We strive to provide a comprehensive and supportive learning environment that fosters the growth and success of our students.
